check-error-online-body: Looks like your site is not online or available. This may occur if:
check-error-online-body-iscorrect: You have entered an incorrect URL. Please make sure your site is correct: {{value}} Want to fix it? {{LinkToEditURLComponent}}
check-error-online-body-isup: Your WordPress website is down or it is too slow to respond. Please contact us or try again later.
check-error-plugin-body:
We can't find the Worona Plugin installed in your site.

Our plugin lets you synchronize your WordPress site with our platform, please make sure it is installed and active.

Install and activate Worona Plugin now or check out our help documentation.
